Lost and Found Software

The premier lost and found solution used by airports, venues, festivals, colleges, and more.

Download White Paper

Trusted by Our Customers & THeirs

Easily Manage Lost and Found While Creating A Transparent Process Your Customers Will Love.

Crowdfind’s lost and found software creates a transparent process – providing your customers with a better experience and giving your employees the tools they need.

Integrations

Allow customers to search for their item and file claims on your website 24/7.

Cloud-Based

Employees are able to seamlessly pick up where others left off.

Communication

Our customer chat decreases phone calls and emails by 85%.

Reporting

Gain insight into your lost and found department with our dynamic reporting.

Show your customers you care with a more transparent lost and found process.

Employees love having a simpler process, customers love the transparency.
See how our lost and found software achieves both.

Trusted worldwide by companies and their customers across multiple industries.

“Crowdfind has been instrumental in the optimization of our 2,000+ item Lost & Found. With Crowdfind, our operation can now be run by 1 person! Having a one-stop shop for all communication with our guests has saved us countless hours of chasing emails & voicemails. Our staff love to use it and the user interface is so easy to learn! Ditch the spreadsheet because nothing compares to this fantastic software!”

Atlanta Braves Lost & Found
